inputs.selection_motivation: EU defense spending signals heightened geopolitical risk, increasing global risk premium and pushing US Treasury yields higher.
inputs.candidate_motivation: These topics are likely strong influences or correlates of EU Defense Spending because they capture the fiscal policy environment (ECB Policy), inflationary pressures (Euro Area Inflation, US Inflation, US Core PCE), borrowing costs (US 10Y Treasury Yield, German 10Y Bund Yield, UK 10Y Gilt Yield, UK 30-Year Gilt Yield), defense industry exposure (Boeing), commodity cost drivers (Oil Price Decline, WTI Crude Oil, Brent Crude Oil), currency dynamics (US Dollar Index, EURUSD, USD/CNY, GBP/USD, USD/JPY), equity market sentiment (Euro Stoxx 50, S&P 500), and broader macro conditions (US Unemployment Claims, US Services PMI, Fed Policy, Fed Rate Cut Sept 17 2025, Fed Powell Rate Cut Hint, SOFR, Euribor).

proposed_link.motivation: EU defense spending signals heightened geopolitical risk, increasing global risk premium and pushing US Treasury yields higher.
